TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public MustInherit Class ToolZone Inherits WebZone Implements IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class ToolZone abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebZone, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 作為一組協助程式區域的基底類別，這些區域只以特定相關聯網頁顯示模式顯示。

span.span: Serves as the base class for a set of helper zones that appear only in certain associated page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是在網頁上，其中包含伺服器控制項，並提供一致的使用者介面 (UI) 中的模組化的版面配置，來包含的控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains server controls, and provides modular layout with a consistent user interface (UI) for the contained controls. 有兩種一般的區域控制項衍生自基底類別：區域和區域。There are two general types of zone controls that derive from the base class: zones and zones. 區域包含伺服器控制項 (它可以是自訂控制項或其他伺服器控制項，包括 ASP.NET 控制項和使用者控制項)。The zones contain server controls (which can be custom controls, or other server controls including ASP.NET controls and user controls). 這些控制項形成網頁上的主要 UI，而且會出現在所有可能的顯示模式，除非它們會隱藏用程式設計方式或使用者。These controls form the primary UI of a Web page and are visible in all the possible display modes, unless they are hidden programmatically or by a user. 區域會顯示只有頁面是在特定區域相關聯的顯示模式，而且這些區域也包含特殊的伺服器控制項，可讓使用者修改版面配置、 外觀、 屬性和內容的特殊的協助程式區域從 web 網頁瀏覽器中。The zones are special helper zones that appear only when a page is in certain display modes associated with the zone, and these zones also contain special server controls that enable users to modify the layout, appearance, properties, and content of Web pages from within a browser. 開發人員可以繼承自基底類別或衍生的任何區域，以建立自訂區域。Developers can inherit from the base class, or any of the derived zones, to create custom zones. Web 組件控制項集合包含三種類型的區域，如下表所示。The Web Parts control set contains three types of zones, described in the following table. |工具區域類型Tool zone type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||包含用來編輯控制項和在頁面上的伺服器控制項屬性。Contains controls used to edit and server control properties on a page.| ||包含控制項，依序包含使用者可以將頁面加入的控制項。Contains controls, which in turn contain controls that users can add to a page.| ||不包含宣告式標記項目。此區域是獨立的。Does not contain declarative markup elements; this zone is self-contained. 在執行階段，它會呈現特殊的 UI，讓使用者管理之間的連線控制項。At run time, it renders a special UI that enables users to manage connections between controls.| 基底類別會提供方法和屬性都有用來衍生區域。The base class provides methods and properties that are useful to derived zones. 它包含和方法覆寫基底方法，從類別，並呈現按鈕和頁首和頁尾區域的其他 UI 屬性。It contains and methods, which override the base methods from the class, and render buttons and other UI attributes for the header and footer of a zone. 另外還有數個成員處理動詞命令，使用者可以在不同區域中執行的通用 UI 動作。There are also several members for handling verbs, which are common UI actions that users can perform in the various zones. 處理動詞命令與相關成員包含： ， ，和。Members related to handling verbs include: , , and . 包含兩個多載的方法，加入物件加入至集合。The contains two overloaded methods, which add objects to the collection. 此集合相關聯的顯示模式會決定與特定類型的區域相關的顯示模式 （也就是說，它會判斷哪些顯示模式的區域會顯示）。This collection of associated display modes determines which display modes are related to a particular type of zone (in other words, it determines in which display modes a zone is visible). 聯集的所有相關聯的所有顯示模式給定的 Web 網頁上的區域會決定哪些 （除了一般的瀏覽模式） 的顯示模式可能或無法支援在頁面上。The union of all associated display modes for all the zones on a given Web page determines which display modes (besides the normal browse mode) are possible or supported on the page. 支援的顯示模式的頁面集合包含在屬性。The collection of supported display modes for a page is contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 在任何時候，可以在頁面上的作用中只能有一個顯示模式。At any given time, only one display mode can be active on a page. 在中參考的目前作用中的顯示模式屬性。The currently active display mode is referenced in the property. 類別也包含數個包含的區域之各種 UI 元素的樣式屬性的樣式屬性。The class also contains a number of style properties that contain style attributes for the various UI elements of a zone. 某些樣式屬性包括， ， ，和。Some style properties include , , , and .

para.span: Web 組件控制項集合包含上面 < 備註 > 一節所列的特定的區域，您通常可以衍生自其中一個將自訂行為加入至區域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and you can often derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 不過，如需以程式設計方式控制區域的轉譯，您應該直接繼承自類別。

span.span: However, for more programmatic control over the rendering of a zone, you should inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 例如，您可能想要建立自訂區域進行特殊化工作，例如搜尋區域。

span.span: For example, you might want to create a custom zone for a specialized task, such as a search zone.

para.span: 若要建立自訂區域，您可以覆寫任何虛擬完全來自訂轉譯，或您的成員可以覆寫特定成員。

span.span: To create a custom zone, you can override any of the virtual members to fully customize the rendering, or you can override only a specific member.

para.span: （選擇性） 您也可以建立自訂的顯示模式為您的區域，由繼承自類別，但這不是必要。

span.span: Optionally, you can also create a custom display mode for your zone by inheriting from the class, but this is not required.

para.span: 在您的區域的建構函式，您應該加入您想要設定您的區域，要顯示不同的顯示模式物件，使您的區域是可見的這些頁面時顯示模式。

span.span: In the constructor of your zone, you should add the various display modes in which you want your zone to be displayed to a object, so that your zone is visible when the page is in those display modes.

summary.span: 將一個或多個 物件與特定區域類型 相關聯，當網頁處於適當網頁顯示模式時，可以顯示該區域。

span.span: Associates one or more objects with a particular type of zone, enabling that zone to be displayed when a page is in the appropriate page display mode.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ToolZone (System.Collections.ICollection associatedDisplayModes);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection associatedDisplayModes) cil managed
Protected Sub New (associatedDisplayModes As ICollection)
protected: ToolZone(System::Collections::ICollection ^ associatedDisplayModes);

param.name: associatedDisplayModes
param.span: 物件的 ，該物件會判斷何時可以顯示區域。

span.span: An of objects that determine when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 將 物件的集合與特定 區域相關聯，以便該區域可以顯示於適當網頁顯示模式。

span.span: Associates a collection of objects with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式來建立關聯區域與一或多個顯示模式。The constructor is used to associate a zone with one or more display modes. 這可讓工具區域會顯示在相關聯的顯示模式。This enables the tool zone to be displayed in the associated display modes. > [!NOTE] > 在實作區域集所提供的 Web 組件控制項，每個區域都與只有一個顯示模式。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 不過，使用這個多載建構函式，它是可以將自訂的區域產生關聯多個顯示模式。However, using this overload of the constructor, it is possible to associate a custom zone with multiple display modes.

span.span: The parameter is equal to or 0.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ToolZone (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode associatedDisplayMode);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode associatedDisplayMode) cil managed
Protected Sub New (associatedDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode)
protected: ToolZone(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartDisplayMode ^ associatedDisplayMode);

span.span: A that determines when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 將單一 物件與特定 區域相關聯，以便該區域可以顯示於適當網頁顯示模式。

span.span: Associates a single object with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式來建立關聯區域與單一的顯示模式。The constructor is used to associate a zone with a single display mode. 這可讓網頁進入該顯示模式時所要顯示的工具區域。This enables the tool zone to be displayed when a page enters that display mode. 例如，控制項可以顯示只有模式。For example, a control can be displayed only in mode.

span.span: The parameter is equal to .

summary.span: 取得與特定 區域相關聯的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects that are associated with a particular zone.

value.span: ，包含與 控制項相關聯的 物件。

span.span: A that contains objects associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個控制項有與它相關聯的特殊頁面顯示模式，如下表所示。Each control has a special page display mode associated with it, as indicated in the following table. > [!NOTE] > 在實作區域集所提供的 Web 組件控制項，每個區域都與只有一個顯示模式。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 不過，使用您無法關聯多個顯示模式中的自訂區域。However, using the you could associate a custom zone with multiple display modes. |工具區域類型Tool zone type|相關聯的顯示模式Associated display mode| |--------------------|-----------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 在頁面上的每個區域的相關聯的顯示模式的集合加入至屬性，決定整組可能的頁面上的顯示模式。The collection of associated display modes for each zone on a page is added to the property, which determines the total set of possible display modes on a page.

summary.span: 提供基底方法宣告，衍生的 控制項可覆寫此基底方法宣告，以處理關閉特定區域的細節。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived controls can override to handle the details of closing a specialized zone.

summary.span: 取得值，其中該值指出目前是否顯示 控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is currently displayed.

value.span: 如果目前顯示 ，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項中，依預設，不會顯示 Web 組件頁面載入時。 controls, by default, are not displayed when a Web Parts page loads. 只有當網頁切換以程式設計方式或在使用者將具有特定相關聯的頁面顯示模式出現控制項。They appear only when the page is switched programmatically or by a user into a page display mode that is associated with a particular control.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style EditUIStyle { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style EditUIStyle
Public ReadOnly Property EditUIStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ EditUIStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項包含之控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for the editable controls contained in a control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中可編輯控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for editable controls within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您存取內含的可編輯控制項的樣式特性控制項。The property enables you to access style characteristics for the editable controls contained within a control. 可編輯的控制項呈現所衍生區域、 以及包含控制項，例如， ，和控制項，可讓使用者編輯屬性值上控制項。Editable controls are rendered by the derived zones, and include controls such as , , and controls that enable users to edit property values on controls. 中所包含的樣式特性屬性套用到可編輯的控制項一起構成編輯使用者介面 (UI)，對使用者顯示。The style characteristics contained in the property apply to the editable controls, which together compose the editing user interface (UI) that appears to users. > [!NOTE] > 即使屬性是唯讀，您可以設定的樣式屬性的基礎物件。Even though the property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性繼承的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 具體來說，它會示範如何變更屬性中的 UI 項目控制項。Specifically, it demonstrates how to change the property for UI elements in an control. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項所參考的頁面上，並可讓您將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property. 請注意，在頁面載入之後，您必須將網頁切換成編輯模式，以查看產生的影響屬性控制項的 UI。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the property on the control's UI. 當您按一下按鈕的時候**變更編輯 UI 文字**，請注意，變更可編輯區域中控制項的字型。As you click the button that says **Change Edit UI Font**, notice that the font of the editable controls in the zone changes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/toolzone_edituistylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/toolzone_edituistylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項頁首中 物件的參考，該物件用於關閉控制項。

span.span: Gets a reference to the object in the header of a control that is used to close the control.
The used to close a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性以程式設計方式或宣告式 Web 的標記頁面來指定用來關閉的動詞命令的各種屬性控制項。You can use the property programmatically or in the declarative markup of a Web page to specify various attributes for the verb that is used to close a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性繼承的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何啟用和停用的標頭中關閉的動詞命令控制項。The example shows how to enable and disable the close verb in the header of an control. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項所參考的頁面上，並可讓您將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 請注意，頁面載入之後，您必須將網頁切換成編輯模式，來查看使用的程式碼的效果屬性控制項。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 當您按一下**啟用/停用關閉動詞命令**區域的標頭中的指令動詞 按鈕，應該或者啟用和停用。As you click the **Enable/Disable Close Verb** button, the verb in the header of the zone should be alternately enabled and disabled. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/toolzone_headercloseverbcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/toolzone_headercloseverbvb.aspx#1)]

public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ HeaderVerbStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示於 控制項中所有頁首動詞命令的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for all header verbs displayed in a control.

value.span: ，包含 中頁首動詞命令的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for header verbs within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，但它是唯讀的可讓您取得或設定基礎的樣式屬性物件中的所有標頭動詞控制項。The property, though it is read-only, enables you to get or set the style attributes of the underlying object for all the header verbs in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性繼承的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何變更周圍的框線寬度使用這個屬性來控制。The example shows how to change the width of the border around an control by using this property. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項所參考的頁面上，並可讓您將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 請注意，頁面載入之後，您必須將網頁切換成編輯模式，來查看使用的程式碼的效果屬性控制項。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 當您按一下**切換標頭動詞命令框線** 按鈕，區域周圍的框線寬度應該變更。As you click the **Toggle Header Verb Border** button, the border width around the zone should change. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/toolzone_headerverbstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/toolzone_headerverbstylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string InstructionText { get; set; }
.property instance string InstructionText
Public Overridable Property InstructionText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ InstructionText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中的文字，該文字提供使用者方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in a control that provides directions for end users.

value.span: 字串，包含使用者的指示。

span.span: A string that contains the directions for end users.

value.span: 適用於特定工具區域的預設值，由衍生的 類別提供。

span.span: A default value appropriate to specific tool zones is provided by derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來保存一組針對某一特定的使用者所提供的指示顯示控制項。The property is used to hold a set of instructions that are provided for end users when a particular control is displayed. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性繼承的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何變更的值中出現的指示文字使用這個屬性來控制。The example shows how to change the value of the instruction text that appears in an control by using this property. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項所參考的頁面上，並可讓您將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式及啟用的使用者，以便在它們之間切換的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分示範部分類別包含程式碼來更新屬性以程式設計方式在`Button1_Click`方法。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that contains the code to update the property programmatically in the `Button1_Click` method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview.vb#2)] 第三個部分的程式碼範例顯示包含兩個繼承的 Web 網頁控制項：控制項和控制項。The third part of the code example shows a Web page that contains two inherited controls: a control and an control. 每個控制項在頁面的宣告式標記中設定某些屬性。Each control sets some properties in the declarative markup of the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 您可以載入瀏覽器，並查看不同的工具區域的行為方式的不同頁面顯示模式之間切換中的頁面。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different tool zones behave. 將頁面切換至編輯模式，在文字方塊中，輸入一些文字，然後按一下**更新區域文字編輯**的效果，以程式設計方式更新屬性。Switch the page into edit mode, enter some text into the text box, and click **Update Edit Zone Text** to see the effect of programmatically updating the property. 指示文字出現在接近區域頂端。The instruction text appears near the top of the zone.

para.span: Web 組件中的工具區域控制項衍生自集合類別 (請參閱中列出的區域類別概觀) 覆寫屬性提供一般使用者的預設值指示。

span.span: Tool zones in the Web Parts control set that derive from the class (see the zones listed in the class overview) override the property to provide default instructions for end users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者關閉的動詞命令的控制，頁面將值傳遞`eventArgument`參數方法，然後呼叫控制項方法。If a user clicks a close verb in a control, when the page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method, the control then calls the method.

span.span: Overrides the base method to provide specialized rendering for the header area required by controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現的標頭的所有詳細資料控制，包括樣式屬性，包含標頭，實際的內容，並關閉動詞命令的資料表。The method renders all the details for the header of a control, including style attributes, the table that contains the header, the actual contents, and a close verb.

span.span: Renders an individual verb with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現特定的使用者介面區域中的物件。The method renders the user interface for a specific object in a zone. 這個方法會檢查值屬性，根據這個值、 動詞命令轉譯為按鈕、 連結或可點選的影像。The method checks the value of the property and, based on that value, renders the verb as a button, a link, or a clickable image.

.property instance bool Visible
Public Overrides Property Visible As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否要呈現為網頁上的使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as a user interface (UI) element on the page.

value.span: 如果控制項在網頁上可見，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會覆寫基底考量基底屬性的值，以及值的屬性屬性。The class overrides the base property to consider both the value of the base property and the value of the property. 如果這兩個屬性值都會設為`true`，則屬性會傳回值為`true`，而控制項則出現在頁面上。If both property values are set to `true`, then the property returns a value of `true`, and the control is visible on the page. 如果其中一個屬性值是`false`、屬性會傳回值為`false`，並看不到控制項。If either property value is `false`, the property returns a value of `false`, and the control is not visible. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性只可以在設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 設計工具中的設計階段指派。The property can only be assigned at design time in a designer, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio designer. 如果您嘗試以程式設計方式設定屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to set the property programmatically, an exception is thrown. 這個屬性不是在視覺化設計工具，可繫結，但可在執行階段繫結。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試在執行階段設定屬性。

span.span: The caller attempts to set the property at run time.
